arStrings.szText: You can now obtain {c_highlight}Vampiric Powers{/c}. Your new {c_highlight}Power{/c} is in {c_highlight}the Seasonal tab of your inventory{/c}.

Activate your {c_highlight}Powers{/c} with {c_highlight}Pacts{/c} from {c_highlight}Pact Armor{/c}. {c_highlight}Vampiric Powers{/c} all draw from the total {c_highlight}Pacts{/c} across your equipped armor.
Spend {c_highlight}Potent Blood{/c} for the option to modify 1 of 3 randomly chosen powers. Locked Powers can be unlocked and unlocked Powers can be upgraded.
